entry.title: 0.8.1 ideas
entry.summary: On March 13, 2013, Andy Parkins and Luke-Jr engaged in a discussion about a proposal. Luke-Jr presented a simple proposal to start the discussion. However, Andy Parkins expressed his opinion that the biggest failure was not the development of two chains but the assurance to users, by the client, that their transactions were confirmed. According to Andy, these two were the same thing.
